casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Luther A. McKINNEY. No. 553P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Charles E. Reece, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of November 2007 by Defendant for Application for Peremptory Writ of Mandamus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
